About Me

DevOps and Cloud Infrastructure Engineer with 6+ years experience automating AWS infrastructure using Terraform, Kubernetes (EKS), and CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions). Designed and deployed infrastructure-as-code solutions for financial services workloads, reducing cloud operational costs by 25% and deployment times by 40% using Terraform. Experienced with AI-assisted tools (Claude, Codex) to speed up infrastructure automation and code generation for cloud environments.
